verses.translation: 2. Hubaal Aadmigu wuxuu ku sugan yahay khasaaro dhan.

verses.arabic_text: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ
verses.translation: 3. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyey mooyee oo samaha fala, ee isu dardaraama Xaqa (iyo caddaalad falka), isuna dardaarama sabarka (iyo sugnaanta).
